T02TD3729E:58b-2: # // mchod gnas dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD3729E:58b-3: chos la 'jug thabs don 'di brtan par bya //
T02TD3729E:58b-4: gang zhig bdag gzhan sdug bsngal spang 'dod cing //
T02TD3729E:58b-5: bde ba 'dod pas dam chos spyad par bya //
T02TD3729E:58b-6: mi rtag chos la bye brag bsam las 'das //
T02TD3729E:58b-7: ci phyir 'jig rten 'di dag mi rtag ste //
T02TD3729E:58b-8: snod kyi 'jig rten ri rab lhun po dang //
T02TD3729E:58b-9: gser gyi ri bdun rol mtsho chen po bdun //
T02TD3729E:58b-10: gling bzhi gling phran lcags ri mu khyud yang //
T02TD3729E:58b-11: 'jig pa'i dus na bskal pa'i me byung bas //
T02TD3729E:58b-12: thal ba'i lhag ma tsam yang mi lus te //
T02TD3729E:58b-13: tha mar chu dang rlung gis 'jig pas na ;
T02TD3729E:58b-14: / brtan zhing nges pa 'dra ste brtag mi bzod //
T02TD3729E:58b-15: lo zla tshes grangs shol ni mi thebs pas //
T02TD3729E:58b-16: lo zla 'das zhing 'jig pa'i dus dang nye //
T02TD3729E:58b-17: dus bzhi 'khor ba sdod pa med pas ni //
T02TD3729E:58b-18: dbyar dro skye la dgun grang skam pa dang //
T02TD3729E:58b-19: lo legs lo nyes than zhod nges pa med //
T02TD3729E:58b-20: rtsi thog ljon shing lo 'dab rgyas pa 'dra //
T02TD3729E:58b-21: dus kyi drod bral rlung gis mi rtag go //
T02TD3729E:58b-22: rtag pa lags na ci phyir 'gyur zhing 'gro //
T02TD3729E:58b-23: de la sogs pa mi rtag dgongs nas gda' //
T02TD3729E:58b-24: bcud kyi 'jig rten 'di yang mi rtag ste //
T02TD3729E:58b-25: nyin zhag 'das shin shi dang phar phar nye //
T02TD3729E:58b-26: 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal gsum gyis rtag tu 'khor //
T02TD3729E:58b-27: skye rga na 'chi rang thag ri mo 'dra //
T02TD3729E:58b-28: 'chi bdag bdud ni so bya nya sdod 'dra //
T02TD3729E:58b-29: 'jig rten 'di na che chung phyug dbul kun //
T02TD3729E:58b-30: 'chi bdag bdud kyi lag tu mi 'gro med //
T02TD3729E:58b-31: snga ma shi ba'i mi rnams kun gyis kyang //
T02TD3729E:58b-32: rtag tu re zhing bu dang nor bsags kyang //
T02TD3729E:59a-2: bu nor phyir lus bdag la phan med pas //
T02TD3729E:59a-3: de phyir bu nor zas la chags mi bya //
T02TD3729E:59a-4: yod pas dge ba'i las la mi 'bad na //
T02TD3729E:59a-5: de ni 'jig rten 'di yi gter bsrung yin //
T02TD3729E:59a-6: shes pas dam pa'i chos la mi spyod na //
T02TD3729E:59a-7: rtag pas gcam bu don med glen pa yin //
T02TD3729E:59a-8: de bas nor med dbul lo bsnyen dga' dang //
T02TD3729E:59a-9: bram ze ldan pa phul ba dag la spyod //
T02TD3729E:59a-10: 'jig rten 'di yi pha ma bu tsha dang //
T02TD3729E:59a-11: phu nu mdza' bshes bran khol nor rnams kun //
T02TD3729E:59a-12: sdug bsngal skal len 'ga' yi mi 'ong ste //
T02TD3729E:59a-13: 'chi ba'i phyir ni gcig kyang mi 'ong ngo //
T02TD3729E:59a-14: don de ma rig sems can mang po kun //
T02TD3729E:59a-15: tshe 'di'i 'khor ba'i nye bshes ched dag tu //
T02TD3729E:59a-16: sdig pa'i bye brag rnam pa mang po spyod //
T02TD3729E:59a-17: phan med rang ni ngan song gsum du ltung //
T02TD3729E:59a-18: de tshe 'gyod kyang phan med nyon mongs snon //
T02TD3729E:59a-19: tshe 'dir phrad pa'i las mthun nye bzhi rnams //
T02TD3729E:59a-20: 'gron po gnas mthun tsam ste so sor 'gro //
T02TD3729E:59a-21: sdig dang bsngos nas zas dang nor bsags kyang //
T02TD3729E:59a-22: sdig pa'i rnam smin rmongs pa bdag gis khur //
T02TD3729E:59a-23: bsags pa'i nor ni phyir lus bu tshas khyer //
T02TD3729E:59a-24: sbrang bus 'bad de sbrang rtsi bsags pa 'dra //
T02TD3729E:59a-25: de bas longs spyod med cing dbul ba yang //
T02TD3729E:59a-26: rgyu 'bras mi slu chos la yid ches pa //
T02TD3729E:59a-27: mos pas dge ba dad pa'i yon phul nas //
T02TD3729E:59a-28: dge slong gser 'byig lta bur gyur pa yod //
T02TD3729E:59a-29: de phyir 'phags pa'i nor bdun dang du blang //
T02TD3729E:59a-30: dad dang tshul khrims gtong dang thos pa dang //
T02TD3729E:59a-31: ngo tsha shes shing khrel yod shes rab ni //
T02TD3729E:59a-32: 'phags pa'i nor bdun lags par thub pas gsungs //
T02TD3729E:59a-33: dper na nor gyi nang na chog shes pa //
T02TD3729E:59a-34: rab mchog lags par lha mi'i ston pas gsungs //
T02TD3729E:59a-35: kun du chog shes mdzad cing chog mkhyen na //
T02TD3729E:59a-36: nor mi bdog kyang yang dag 'byor par 'gyur //
T02TD3729E:59a-37: bdag la shin tu phangs pa'i lus 'di yang //
T02TD3729E:59a-38: gos rnying lam du bor ba bzhin du 'gro //
T02TD3729E:59a-39: da lta sa stengs 'di na gnas pa kun //
T02TD3729E:59a-40: lo brgya tshun chad gcig kyang mi lus so //
T02TD3729E:59a-41: brgya thub 'bum la gcig kyang mi 'byung na //
T02TD3729E:59a-42: brgya la srid kyang phal cher yengs 'gyur te //
T02TD3729E:59b-0: mtshan mo nyal bas brgya phyed @59b gnyid dbang du //
T02TD3729E:59b-1: song ste de la dran med shi dang 'dra //
T02TD3729E:59b-2: lhag ma lnga bcu yod du zad kyang ni //
T02TD3729E:59b-3: ra ro nyal dang 'du byed rnams kyi rkyen //
T02TD3729E:59b-4: lnga bcu phyed ni der yang zad pas ni /
T02TD3729E:59b-5: legs par dran pa nyi shu rtsa lnga yod //
T02TD3729E:59b-6: de yang rang la dbang byar ma mchis te //
T02TD3729E:59b-7: de ring do nub 'chi 'am gtol med kyi //
T02TD3729E:59b-8: da lta nyid du brtun te 'bad la bya'o //
T02TD3729E:59b-9: tshe 'di zil pa 'dra ste med la khad //
T02TD3729E:59b-10: dbugs ni na bun 'dra ste yal la khad //
T02TD3729E:59b-11: lus ni sgyu ma 'dra ste snang la med //
T02TD3729E:59b-12: sems ni glog dang 'dra ste skad cig ma //
T02TD3729E:59b-13: phung po mi rtag 'chi zhing 'gyur ba ste //
T02TD3729E:59b-14: dar ba'i mdog ni nyon mongs nad kyis 'phrog /'chi ba'i srog ni 'chi bdag bdud kyis 'phrog / dper na chu 'gram g-yang sa'i sdong po 'dra //
T02TD3729E:59b-15: ring por mi thogs bya khyi dur pa dang //
T02TD3729E:59b-16: srin bya 'ug pa bya rgod khva steg dang //
T02TD3729E:59b-17: khyi ltogs wa dang 'bu sbrang gzan du 'gyur //
T02TD3729E:59b-18: de bzhin sgyu ma mi rtag mi rtogs par ;
T02TD3729E:59b-19: / phung po 'di yi ched du sdig spyod pa //
T02TD3729E:59b-20: ma rig glen pa nyon mongs snying re rje //
T02TD3729E:59b-21: zas nor 'brel pa'i longs spyod 'ja' tshon 'dra //
T02TD3729E:59b-22: rmi lam longs spyod rnyed dang mtshungs pa ste //
T02TD3729E:59b-23: de ltar 'dus byas thams cad mi rtag pas //
T02TD3729E:59b-24: dam pa'i chos la myur du 'bad par bya'o //
T02TD3729E:59b-25: de bas 'phags pa'i gzugs brnyan mchod gnas la //
T02TD3729E:59b-26: mos pa'i dad pas dge la brtson pa ni //
T02TD3729E:59b-27: bla med byang chub thob par 'gyur ba'i dpe //
T02TD3729E:59b-28: rgyal po gsal thub lta bur gyur pa'o //
T02TD3729E:59b-29: de phyir mchod pa'i las la brtson par bya //
T02TD3729E:59b-30: cis te mi lus thob pa shin tu dka' //
T02TD3729E:59b-31: khom ldan mi lus thob par gyur pa na ;
T02TD3729E:59b-32: / phyi ma'i phan pa 'di la ma bsgrubs na //
T02TD3729E:59b-33: phyis ni mtho ris thob par ga la 'gyur //
T02TD3729E:59b-34: ngan song skyes nas sdug bsngal 'byung ba'i tshe //
T02TD3729E:59b-35: tshe 'di'i btsan phyug bde skyid ci la phan //
T02TD3729E:59b-36: snga mar ci spyad dran pas shin tu sdug / de phyir 'khor ba'i chos la ma yengs par //
T02TD3729E:59b-37: zhe sdang chen po me ltar 'bar ba la //
T02TD3729E:59b-38: snying rje chen po'i chu yis myur du sod //
T02TD3729E:59b-39: 'dod chags ser sna'i mdud pa dam po de //
T02TD3729E:59b-40: chags med sbyin pa chen po'i sems kyis khrol //
T02TD3729E:59b-41: gti mug mun pa chen po 'thibs pa de //
T02TD3729E:59b-42: shes rab gsal ba'i sgron me chen po theg / nyon mongs kun la gnyen po bcug nas ni //
T02TD3729E:60a-0: @60a * // 'khor ba'i chu bo chen po bzhi rnams la //
T02TD3729E:60a-1: brtson 'grus gru bcugs nas ni rgal bar bya //
T02TD3729E:60a-2: do cig yod pas sang phod yod pa bzhin //
T02TD3729E:60a-3: tshe 'di yod pas phyi ma yod par nges //
T02TD3729E:60a-4: sang phod lo dang sku tshe slad ma ni //
T02TD3729E:60a-5: gang sngar 'ong ba su la'ang gtol med pas //
T02TD3729E:60a-6: sang phod don du so nam 'bad ba bzhin //
T02TD3729E:60a-7: phyi ma'i don du dam chos spyad par rigs //
T02TD3729E:60a-8: de ring do nub kho na mi 'chi zhes //
T02TD3729E:60a-9: bag med bde bar 'dug pa rigs ma yin //
T02TD3729E:60a-10: tshe 'di mi sdod ri gzar chu dang 'dra //
T02TD3729E:60a-11: ring por mi rtag rtsva kha'i zil pa 'dra //
T02TD3729E:60a-12: yang na skye shi chu yi chu bur 'dra //
T02TD3729E:60a-13: 'khor bar skye ba shing rta'i 'khor lo 'dra //
T02TD3729E:60a-14: de bas rang gi lus la ma chags par //
T02TD3729E:60a-15: skyabs kyi sbyin pas 'gro la phan btags na //
T02TD3729E:60a-16: bla med byang chub thob par 'gyur ba'i dpe //
T02TD3729E:60a-17: rgyal po shi byin lta bur gyur ba'ang yod //
T02TD3729E:60a-18: mi yi chos lugs legs par spyad pas na //
T02TD3729E:60a-19: mtho ris lha yul bgrod pa thag mi ring //
T02TD3729E:60a-20: mtho ris thar pa'i go 'phang gang yin pa //
T02TD3729E:60a-21: 'jog na thar pa gam na 'dug pas na //
T02TD3729E:60a-22: de bas mi dge bcu spang dge bcu spyod //
T02TD3729E:60a-23: grags pa nyams par 'gyur ba'i chos drug spong //
T02TD3729E:60a-24: dge la mi skur sdig la mi bstod de //
T02TD3729E:60a-25: 'bras bu gang spyad de dang mnyam par gsungs //
T02TD3729E:60a-26: ngan song sdug bsngal shes kyang mi 'jigs par //
T02TD3729E:60a-27: mi rtag lus la chags nas sdig spyod pa //
T02TD3729E:60a-28: ae ma'o rang gis rang rlag snying re rje //
T02TD3729E:60a-29: yi dags byol song sdug bsngal skyi re bung //
T02TD3729E:60a-30: dmyal khams bco brgyad sdug bsngal ya re cha //
T02TD3729E:60a-31: skye rga na 'chi'i sdug bsngal rgyun re ring //
T02TD3729E:60a-32: phung po sgyu ma zas nor bsnyen ma yin //
T02TD3729E:60a-33: 'khrul pa'i gnyen bshes 'khor ba'i bshal thag pas //
T02TD3729E:60a-34: de ring rang dbang yod pa'i mi rnams kyis //
T02TD3729E:60a-35: rang dang 'brel pa'i zas nor gnyen bshes la //
T02TD3729E:60a-36: ser snas mi bcing chags sems mi skyed do //
T02TD3729E:60a-37: sems can rtsal shugs med la skur mi bya //
T02TD3729E:60a-38: chang ni ha la'i dug bzhin rab tu bsrung //
T02TD3729E:60a-39: gzhan gyi bud med dag la chags mi bya //
T02TD3729E:60a-40: rnam smin med pa'i so nam mi bor zhing //
T02TD3729E:60a-41: gzhan gyi nor la brtsi bdag chom rkun sbang //
T02TD3729E:60a-42: don du lus ngag yid gsum spyod pa gzab //
T02TD3729E:60a-43: mdor na mtshams med lnga dang nye ba lnga //
T02TD3729E:60a-44: lci bzhi log brgyad kha na ma tho gsum //
T02TD3729E:60b-0: 'di @60b spyod ngan song gsum du gdon mi za //
T02TD3729E:60b-1: mi rigs sdig pa sngon du spyod pa las //
T02TD3729E:60b-2: 'gyod pa drag po sems ni bskyed nas su //
T02TD3729E:60b-3: sdig pa 'phro bcad dge ba spyod pa ni //
T02TD3729E:60b-4: 'bras bu mtho ris thob par gdon mi za //
T02TD3729E:60b-5: de yang cis mngon ston pa'i bka' las ni //
T02TD3729E:60b-6: dang po rgyal po ma skyes dgra yis su //
T02TD3729E:60b-7: mtshams med pa yi sdig pa byas pa las //
T02TD3729E:60b-8: nags kyi drang srong dag las sems bskyed nas //
T02TD3729E:60b-9: 'gyod pa'i sems kyis 'bras bu thob pa 'dra'o //
T02TD3729E:60b-10: de phyir nges pa 'phral bshags dge la sbyor //
T02TD3729E:60b-11: gzhan yang dang po kha na ma tho ba'i //
T02TD3729E:60b-12: tshig gis skur ba btab ste snang ba las //
T02TD3729E:60b-13: mod la 'gyod de bshags pa phul na ni //
T02TD3729E:60b-14: bu mo rdo rje lta bur skyes pa'o //
T02TD3729E:60b-15: mdor na gzhan don spyod par gsungs pa ste //
T02TD3729E:60b-16: bdag phyir gzhan la gnod byas bde bar 'gyur //
T02TD3729E:60b-17: ma rig skye bo rang gi don byed dang //
T02TD3729E:60b-18: ston pa sangs rgyas gzhan gyi don byed gnyis //
T02TD3729E:60b-19: 'bras bu che chung khyad par de 'dra bas ;
T02TD3729E:60b-20: / sems can bkres pas nyen par gyur pa la //
T02TD3729E:60b-21: zas nor lus kyi sgo nas phan 'dogs pa //
T02TD3729E:60b-22: rgyal po shud lo gar ne lta bu de //
T02TD3729E:60b-23: gzhan don spyad na 'bras bu thob par 'gyur //
T02TD3729E:60b-24: 'di dag shes nas dge med sdig spyod pa //
T02TD3729E:60b-25: mi shes sdig spyod sdig pa brgya 'gyur che //
T02TD3729E:60b-26: de bas don med las la ma brtson par //
T02TD3729E:60b-27: dge ba'i las la rtag tu spyad par bya //
T02TD3729E:60b-28: rgyu 'bras shes rkyen dge ba'i bshes gnyen pas //
T02TD3729E:60b-29: de phyir dge bshes dam pa btsal bar bya //
T02TD3729E:60b-30: de ni legs pa kun ston nyes pa skyob //
T02TD3729E:60b-31: yang dag lam ston 'bras bu skyed byed pas //
T02TD3729E:60b-32: pha ma sa mkhan dus kyi dbyar dang 'dra'o //
T02TD3729E:60b-33: de phyir dge bshes dam pa rtag tu bsten //
T02TD3729E:60b-34: chos kyang shes pas mi chog spyad pa gces //
T02TD3729E:60b-35: ci yi phyir na mi chos so nam 'dra //
T02TD3729E:60b-36: chos kyis bdag bshad bdag gis chos ma bshad //
T02TD3729E:60b-37: don rtogs bya phyir dang po mnyan yang dgos //
T02TD3729E:60b-38: nges pa rnyed nas tshig mang bslab mi dgos //
T02TD3729E:60b-39: tshig mi zad phyir nyan pas mthar thug med //
T02TD3729E:60b-40: nyan cing 'chad pa spyad thabs btsal phyir yin //
T02TD3729E:60b-41: mi spyod nyan 'chad don chung tshi re chad //
T02TD3729E:60b-42: gzhan la 'chad pa tshig gi than pa yin //
T02TD3729E:60b-43: gzhan gyi than 'byal ngang la mi phan te //
T02TD3729E:60b-44: bro mkhan sgrung mkhan bro sgrung 'chad pa 'dra //
T02TD3729E:61a-0: de ni mi nag chos kyi lo rgyus @61a * //
T02TD3729E:61a-2: / thos pas brgyags nas rang sems ma thul na //
T02TD3729E:61a-3: mkhas kyang phan med slar la 'khor ba'i rgyu //
T02TD3729E:61a-4: thos mang tshig la mkhas pa ne tso 'dra //
T02TD3729E:61a-5: 'gro ba gang zhig rang la med pa yi //
T02TD3729E:61a-6: nor bu rin po che yi yon tan dag / ji snyed brjod kyang rang la phan med 'gyur //
T02TD3729E:61a-7: de bzhin chos shes chos dang mi ldan pas //
T02TD3729E:61a-8: spyad thabs che ba'i yon tan ji snyed cig / brjod kyang rang gi don la phan med 'gyur //
T02TD3729E:61a-9: gzhan yang shes nas dam chos ma spyad na //
T02TD3729E:61a-10: rgya mtsho'i nang du skom nas shi ba 'dra //
T02TD3729E:61a-11: gzhan yang khe phyir gzhan la chos 'chad pa //
T02TD3729E:61a-12: rin chen rnyed kyang sbrang po 'dra zhes gsungs ;
T02TD3729E:61a-13: / dper na sman mkhan nad la mi gtong dang //
T02TD3729E:61a-14: dbul mos phyug po'i nor bgrangs ba dang 'dra //
T02TD3729E:61a-15: lam rgyus shes kyang ma phyin 'dra zhes gsungs //
T02TD3729E:61a-16: de bas 'gro ba kun kyang chos la gzud //
T02TD3729E:61a-17: pha ma bu tsha gnyen 'dun thams cad dang //
T02TD3729E:61a-18: 'khor g-yog las kyis 'brel pa thams cad kun //
T02TD3729E:61a-19: gros btab gal gyis gcu de dge la gzud //
T02TD3729E:61a-20: chos la chung na byang chub spyod pa yin //
T02TD3729E:61a-21: dge ba nyam chung sdig pa stobs chen dang //
T02TD3729E:61a-22: bla med byang chub sems ni ma bskyed par //
T02TD3729E:61a-23: dge ba gzhan gyi zil gyis mi non pas //
T02TD3729E:61a-24: 'khor ba'i btson ra bsdams shing nyam thag pa'i //
T02TD3729E:61a-25: bdag gzhan mi bde bsal bar 'dod pa des //
T02TD3729E:61a-26: byang chub sems gnyis rtag tu gtang mi bya //
T02TD3729E:61a-27: sdig med dge ba'i sems dang ldan de la //
T02TD3729E:61a-28: bde gshegs rnams kyi sras su dgongs pa dang //
T02TD3729E:61a-29: lha mir 'god pa kun gyis phyag bya'i 'os //
T02TD3729E:61a-30: mdor na byang chub rnam pa gsum dgos te ;
T02TD3729E:61a-31: / dang por smon dgos bar du 'jug kyang dgos //
T02TD3729E:61a-32: tha mar don de nyid la gnas par bya //
T02TD3729E:61a-33: smon kyang ma zhugs don la ma gnas na //
T02TD3729E:61a-34: yid smon byas pas 'bras bu mi thob pas //
T02TD3729E:61a-35: byang chub spyod pa rlabs chen spyad par bya //
T02TD3729E:61a-36: rgyu ni dka' ba dang du ma blangs par //
T02TD3729E:61a-37: 'bras bu byang chub thob par mi 'gyur te //
T02TD3729E:61a-38: gang la sbyin pa mchog tu gtang dka' ba //
T02TD3729E:61a-39: yan lag kun gyi dang po mgo bo yin //
T02TD3729E:61a-40: sbyin par btang ba rgyal po zla 'od yin //
T02TD3729E:61a-41: de bzhin spyad na byang chub thob par 'gyur //
T02TD3729E:61a-42: de phyir 'khor ba'i chos 'di gtan du sbang //
T02TD3729E:61a-43: mya ngan 'das pa'i lam la 'jug par bya //
T02TD3729E:61b-0: sbyin @61b pa'i pha rol phyin pa yongs rdzogs na //
T02TD3729E:61b-1: sa ni dang po rab tu dga' ba thob //
T02TD3729E:61b-2: tshul khrims pha rol phyin pa yongs rdzogs na //
T02TD3729E:61b-3: gnyis pa dri ma med pa'i sa yang thob //
T02TD3729E:61b-4: bzod pa'i pha rol phyin pa yongs rdzogs na //
T02TD3729E:61b-5: gsum pa 'od byed pa yis yang thob //
T02TD3729E:61b-6: brtson 'grus pha rol phyin pa yongs rdzogs na //
T02TD3729E:61b-7: bzhi pa 'od 'phro ba yis yang thob //
T02TD3729E:61b-8: bsam gtan pha rol phyin pa yongs rdzogs na //
T02TD3729E:61b-9: lnga pa shin tu sbyang dka'i sa yang thob //
T02TD3729E:61b-10: shes rab pha rol phyin pa yongs rdzogs na //
T02TD3729E:61b-11: drug pa mngon du gyur pa'i sa yang thob //
T02TD3729E:61b-12: thabs kyi pha rol phyin pa yongs rdzogs na //
T02TD3729E:61b-13: bdun pa ring du song ba'i sa yang thob //
T02TD3729E:61b-14: smon lam pha rol phyin pa yongs rdzogs na //
T02TD3729E:61b-15: brgyad pa mi g-yo ba yis yang thob //
T02TD3729E:61b-16: stobs kyi pha rol phyin pa yongs rdzogs na //
T02TD3729E:61b-17: dgu pa legs pa'i blo gros sa yang thob //
T02TD3729E:61b-18: ye shes pha rol phyin pa yongs rdzogs na //
T02TD3729E:61b-19: bcu pa chos kyi sbyin gyis yang thob //
T02TD3729E:61b-20: 'bras bu sku gsum lhun gyis grub par 'gyur //
T02TD3729E:61b-21: ji ltar sngon gyi bde gshegs rnams kyis su //
T02TD3729E:61b-22: byang chub mchog tu thugs ni bskyed pa dang //
T02TD3729E:61b-23: byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rlabs po che //
T02TD3729E:61b-24: rim par gnas nas 'bras bu thob pa ltar //
T02TD3729E:61b-25: de bzhin bdag dang gzhan la phan don du //
T02TD3729E:61b-26: sems bskyed nas ni dge ba gzhung du spyod //
T02TD3729E:61b-27: de ltar dam chos gzhung du spyad pa na //
T02TD3729E:61b-28: nyon mongs 'chi bdag bdud ni 'joms pa yi //
T02TD3729E:61b-29: bdud rtsi mchog nyid kyang ni de yin no //
T02TD3729E:61b-30: de phyir dam chos gzung bzhin spyad par bya //
T02TD3729E:61b-31: chos gzhung mi spyod chos pa'i ming ci yod //
T02TD3729E:61b-32: tshul khrims mi srung dge slong ci la zer //
T02TD3729E:61b-33: dam tshig med na sngags pa gang la zer //
T02TD3729E:61b-34: sdig ni chung yang mi brnyas spang bar bya //
T02TD3729E:61b-35: dge ba chung yang dang du blang bar bya //
T02TD3729E:61b-36: mdor na tshad med bzhi dang bsdu ba bzhi //
T02TD3729E:61b-37: gzhan don spyad na bdag don chung mi za //
T02TD3729E:61b-38: de phyir sgrib gnyis sbong sa la tshogs gnyis bsgrub ;
T02TD3729E:61b-39: / ston pa'i bka' dang don du mthun byed cing //
T02TD3729E:61b-40: chags med dge bar gtong ba'i gang zag ni //
T02TD3729E:61b-41: byang chub sems dpa'i rigs can yin pas na //
T02TD3729E:61b-42: de la phrag dog dbang gis sgro skur zhing //
T02TD3729E:61b-43: thabs kyis smod byed 'khor ba'i g-yang sar ltung //
T02TD3729E:62a-0: dge ba'i sngon la zhugs pa'i gang @62a * //
T02TD3729E:62a-2: nyon mongs 'du 'dzi med pa'i dge gnas na //
T02TD3729E:62a-3: mtshan mo stod smad dge la gnas nas ni //
T02TD3729E:62a-4: gung la nyal tshe dge dran 'phro la nyal //
T02TD3729E:62a-5: de yis bag chags dge la gnas par 'gyur //
T02TD3729E:62a-6: bag chags rtags par gnas na dang po'i drod //
T02TD3729E:62a-7: yin bas dge ba nyams 'og chud de bya //
T02TD3729E:62a-8: zas kyang chags phyir ma yin brgyags phyir min //
T02TD3729E:62a-9: dge rtag bya phyir tshod ni zin par bza' //
T02TD3729E:62a-10: rgod dang 'gyod dang gnod sems rmugs pa dang //
T02TD3729E:62a-11: gnyid dang 'dod la 'dun dang the tshom ste //
T02TD3729E:62a-12: sgrib pa lnga po 'di dag dge ba'i nor //
T02TD3729E:62a-13: 'phrog pa'i chom rkun lags pas rig par mdzod //
T02TD3729E:62a-14: ston pa'i bka' la brdzun pa mi mda' bas //
T02TD3729E:62a-15: the tshom nem nur yid gnyis mi bya'o //
T02TD3729E:62a-16: don la spyad cing tshig phyir mi 'brangs te //
T02TD3729E:62a-17: don ni gser 'dra tshig ni sgron ma bzhin //
T02TD3729E:62a-18: gser rnyed nas ni sgron ma gdeg mi dgos //
T02TD3729E:62a-19: don la spyad cing bsgoms na rang rig skye //
T02TD3729E:62a-20: tshig phyir nyan cing 'chad pa mang byas kyang //
T02TD3729E:62a-21: rang rig mi skye nyon mongs 'phel ba'i rgyu //
T02TD3729E:62a-22: mdor na theg pa kun la blo sbyangs te //
T02TD3729E:62a-23: nges pa gcig la zhugs te mi sgrub par //
T02TD3729E:62a-24: ye rngam zos nas byang chub 'khrul pa ste //
T02TD3729E:62a-25: des ni 'bras bu thob par mi 'gyur ro //
T02TD3729E:62a-26: chos kyang rang gi nyams dang dpyad cing spyad //
T02TD3729E:62a-27: 'bras bu gong ma che la gtang byas na //
T02TD3729E:62a-28: nyams kyis mi lcogs bzhin du khas len pa //
T02TD3729E:62a-29: thang stong sdig pa rang gis blangs pa yin //
T02TD3729E:62a-30: theg pa'i grangs ni gcig tu ma nges la //
T02TD3729E:62a-31: theg pa'i khyad par shes rab che chung ste //
T02TD3729E:62a-32: nyams 'og chud par spyad na chud mi za //
T02TD3729E:62a-33: dam chos gzhung du spyod pa'i mi de la //
T02TD3729E:62a-34: dam can kun yang ma bskul rang bzhin 'og / mkhas pa chen po'i mthu ni nyi shar 'dra //
T02TD3729E:62a-35: 'gro ba kun kyang dad cing 'dun pas na //
T02TD3729E:62a-36: 'dus byas 'dus ma byas kyi dge ba la //
T02TD3729E:62a-37: thun mong dag tu spang len med par bya //
T02TD3729E:62a-38: spang len byas na ston pa'i bka' dang 'gal //
T02TD3729E:62a-39: theg chen sgor zhugs gang zag rnams kyis kyang //
T02TD3729E:62a-40: shes rab snying rje gnyis gyis gzhi bzung ste //
T02TD3729E:62a-41: thams cad dbyer med rtogs pa shes rab yin //
T02TD3729E:62a-42: kun la bu bzhin byams pa snying rje yin //
T02TD3729E:62a-43: de gnyis mi ldan theg chen khas 'che ba //
T02TD3729E:62b-0: long @62b sprang rgyal po yin zhes zer te brdzun //
T02TD3729E:62b-1: da lta'i gang zag sngags kyi sgor zhugs pas //
T02TD3729E:62b-2: gsang sngags zab mo nor rdzas brnyan mar btsongs //
T02TD3729E:62b-3: 'khor ba'i bu tsha pho mo khyim thab byed //
T02TD3729E:62b-4: gsang sngags shes pas bdag phung snying re rje //
T02TD3729E:62b-5: des ni tsandan sol bar 'tshod ba dang //
T02TD3729E:62b-6: gser phye sbang phyer 'tshong dang 'dra bar gsungs //
T02TD3729E:62b-7: gzhan yang dad pa can gyi nor blangs nas //
T02TD3729E:62b-8: dge bar ma spyad mi chos nor du spyad //
T02TD3729E:62b-9: 'bras bu dag ni rnga mo'i lus su skye //
T02TD3729E:62b-10: de yi nor la nor bdag longs spyod bya //
T02TD3729E:62b-11: spyod res sdug bsngal nyams su myong bar 'gyur //
T02TD3729E:62b-12: lcags rdo dngul rdo bzhu ru btub pas na //
T02TD3729E:62b-13: dad pa can gyi nor ni bzhur mi btub //
T02TD3729E:62b-14: tshig tsam ma yin sems kyis mnyam pa nyid //
T02TD3729E:62b-15: rtogs nas klong du gyur cing drod ldan dang //
T02TD3729E:62b-16: chags med dge bar spyod pa'i gang zag gis //
T02TD3729E:62b-17: ma byin blangs nas spyad kyang mi sgrib bo //
T02TD3729E:62b-18: mdor na sngags kyi rtsa ba dam tshig bsrung //
T02TD3729E:62b-19: bya ba'i rgyud kyi dam tshig bstan pa ni //
T02TD3729E:62b-20: thun mong bslab pa bzhi po nyams mi bya //
T02TD3729E:62b-21: bla med rnam gsum mchod cing bla ma bkur //
T02TD3729E:62b-22: grogs la gdung zhing mi mthun kha zas sbang //
T02TD3729E:62b-23: mtshan mar byas shing lha la phul ba yi //
T02TD3729E:62b-24: khrus la brtson pa bskyed cing lus spyod bzang//
T02TD3729E:62b-25: ma nyams bsrungs na rigs gsum dngos grub thob //
T02TD3729E:62b-26: rnal 'byor phyi pa'i dam tshig bstan pa ni //
T02TD3729E:62b-27: spyi yi dam tshig gsum po nyams mi bya //
T02TD3729E:62b-28: rtsa ba'i dam tshig drug ni gzhung du bsrung //
T02TD3729E:62b-29: yan lag dam tshig gsum dang ldan par bya //
T02TD3729E:62b-30: ma nyams bsrungs na 'bras bu thob par 'gyur //
T02TD3729E:62b-31: rnal 'byor nang pa'i dam tshig bstan pa ni //
T02TD3729E:62b-32: dam tshig bye brag bsam gyis mi khyab kyang //
T02TD3729E:62b-33: mdo ru bsdu na rtsa ba gsum du 'dus //
T02TD3729E:62b-34: lus srog bskyed pa'i dus gsum pha ma dang //
T02TD3729E:62b-35: ma rig sgo 'byed 'dren ston slob dpon dang //
T02TD3729E:62b-36: dam pas 'brel pa'i grogs mched rnams la ni //
T02TD3729E:62b-37: lus ngag yid gsum don dang mthun par bsrung //
T02TD3729E:62b-38: yi dam lha yi ting 'dzin g-yang mi bya //
T02TD3729E:62b-39: de yi sngags dang phyag rgya rgyun mi bcad //
T02TD3729E:62b-40: dam tshig nyams dang ma 'dres snod med la //
T02TD3729E:62b-41: gsang ba'i man ngag spel bar mi bya'o //
T02TD3729E:62b-42: da lta gang zag sngags par khas 'ches nas //
T02TD3729E:63a-2: pha ma spong brdung bla ma smod mi khur //
T02TD3729E:63a-3: phrag dog dbang gis grogs la brtse gdung bcad //
T02TD3729E:63a-4: ngan song gnas su the tshom med par 'gro //
T02TD3729E:63a-5: gsung gi dam tshig gzhung du mi srung bar //
T02TD3729E:63a-7: phyag rgya ma byin zas nor len byed pa'i //
T02TD3729E:63a-8: sngags par khas 'ches 'khor ba'i g-yang sar lhung //
T02TD3729E:63a-9: gsang sngags zab mo dgon par ma spyod par //
T02TD3729E:63a-10: snod dang mi ldan nyan mi rnyed thad la //
T02TD3729E:63a-11: beg co bcas nas man ngag lhug par bshad //
T02TD3729E:63a-12: thugs kyi dam tshig nyams pas dmyal bar skye //
T02TD3729E:63a-13: gsang sngags gab pa'i don rnams ma rtogs par //
T02TD3729E:63a-14: dam med mi nag khral theg kun bsdus nas //
T02TD3729E:63a-15: sbas pa'i gsang ba mngon sum 'chol bar spyod //
T02TD3729E:63a-16: bka' dang 'gal bas 'khor ba'i g-yang sar ltung //
T02TD3729E:63a-17: dang por dam tshig gzhung du mi srung dang //
T02TD3729E:63a-18: bar du dbang rnams rim par mi nod dang //
T02TD3729E:63a-19: tha mar bka' gzhung bzhin du mi sgrub par //
T02TD3729E:63a-20: sngags par khas 'che gang zag snying re rje //
T02TD3729E:63a-21: bza' shing ra bar dug gi sdong skyes nas //
T02TD3729E:63a-22: dug des bza' shing byin yang med byed pas //
T02TD3729E:63a-23: bdag pos dug de ngo ni shes ma thag / rtsa nas phyung ste myur du med byed ltar //
T02TD3729E:63a-24: gang zhig rtsa ba nyams pa'i phyal ba dang //
T02TD3729E:63a-26: don rig nas ni myur du spang bar bya //
T02TD3729E:63a-27: dper na 'o ma nyung ngu'i thigs pa gcig / rul bas 'o ma kun kyang rul ba bzhin //
T02TD3729E:63a-28: dam nyams snod ngan de dang 'dres pa na //
T02TD3729E:63a-29: nyams pa de dang de ni 'dra bar gsungs //
T02TD3729E:63a-30: de bas lung gcig chu la'ang mi btung ngo //
T02TD3729E:63a-31: dam tshig sa gzhi 'dra ste kun gyi rten //
T02TD3729E:63a-32: dam tshig nor bu 'dra ste 'dod pa 'byung //
T02TD3729E:63a-33: dam tshig mkhar dad 'dra ste 'jigs pa skyobs //
T02TD3729E:63a-34: dam tshig gru dang 'dra ste chu bo sgrol //
T02TD3729E:63a-35: mdor na chos kyi rtsa ba dam tshig bsrung //
T02TD3729E:63a-36: phyi rabs rnal 'byor rnams kyi sems la 'jog / rnam smin gzhan ni khad dang rim gyis smin //
T02TD3729E:63a-37: gsang sngags thun mong ma yin rnam smin drag / sgyu mar sbrul zhugs bzhin du 'gro ba'o zhes //
T02TD3729E:63a-38: gsang ba'i rgyud rnams kun las gsal bar 'byung //
T02TD3729E:63b-0: gang zag sngags par khas len rnams @63b kyis ni //
T02TD3729E:63b-1: rang gzhan ting 'dzin gzugs brnyan dkyil 'khor gsum //
T02TD3729E:63b-2: dam tshig dbang dang mchod ba'i sgor zhugs nas //
T02TD3729E:63b-3: rang nyid zab mo'i don dang ldan par bya //
T02TD3729E:63b-4: theg pa 'og ma'i sgor zhugs bsrung sdom dang //
T02TD3729E:63b-5: chos spyod byed pa mi dgag mi smod do //
T02TD3729E:63b-6: ci phyir chos la spang len phyogs ris dang //
T02TD3729E:63b-7: bzang ngan gnyis su stan pas ma gsungs bas //
T02TD3729E:63b-8: 'di ltar snang ba'i chos 'di thams cad la //
T02TD3729E:63b-9: gnyis med mnyam pa chen por rtogs pa ni //
T02TD3729E:63b-10: 'bad rtsol ci byas dge bar gyur pas na //
T02TD3729E:63b-11: dge ba'i rtsa ba phyogs ris med par bya'o //
T02TD3729E:63b-12: da lta'i gang zag theg pa 'og ma pa'i //
T02TD3729E:63b-13: rgyu 'bras don la zhen pa kha cig ni //
T02TD3729E:63b-14: gsang sngags zab mo'i don rnams ma rtogs par //
T02TD3729E:63b-15: sngags kyi tan gan chos spyod 'phrigs mthong nas //
T02TD3729E:63b-16: ban de log chos spyod cing rtsing chos byed //
T02TD3729E:63b-17: gsang sngags chos min ston pas ma gsungs zer //
T02TD3729E:63b-18: man ngag zab mo'i don la skur btab pas //
T02TD3729E:63b-19: 'bras bu mnar med dmyal ba'i yang steng du //
T02TD3729E:63b-20: skye bar gyur pas rmongs pa snying re rje //
T02TD3729E:63b-21: ston pa'i zhal nas nges par gsungs pa yi //
T02TD3729E:63b-22: man ngag don dam gsang sngags zab mo la //
T02TD3729E:63b-23: bka' bslad gzhung bzhin dang du mi len par //
T02TD3729E:63b-24: mtshan nyid chos spyod dag la blo zhen pas//
T02TD3729E:63b-25: bskal pa gsum du sangs rgyas zhal mi mthong //
T02TD3729E:63b-26: skal ba chung zhing shes rag zhen pa dang //
T02TD3729E:63b-27: blo ngan don la rmongs pa'i gnag zag gis //
T02TD3729E:63b-28: zab mo'i don la ma zhugs skur pa btab //
T02TD3729E:63b-29: rnam smin dpag gis mi lang brjod las 'das //
T02TD3729E:63b-30: gsang sngags zab mo'i don la yid ches nas//
T02TD3729E:63b-31: lta spyod dam tshig gzhung du ldan pa dang //
T02TD3729E:63b-32: sgrub la shin tu brtson pa'i gang zag ni //
T02TD3729E:63b-33: sangs rgyas sa la the tshom med par 'gro //
T02TD3729E:63b-34: skye bo ma rig chos la gzud pa dang //
T02TD3729E:63b-35: chos pa chos dang mi ldan pa rnams kyi //
T02TD3729E:63b-36: don du bdag gis yi ge 'di brtsams pas //
T02TD3729E:63b-37: kun kyang dad cing don la 'jug par smon //
T02TD3729E:63b-38: zhen log sgron ma zhes bya ba slob dpon mkhas pa klu sgrub kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so//
